name: Contained monsters (WIP)
description:
This game is a project about children summoning giant monsters to fight duels. The retro aesthetics will remind you of your childhood, when everything was simpler. There is not much to do in this prototype, just walk around and enjoy the music.

Prototype controls:

  •  WASD / arrow keys: move / select option in menu (the menu does nothing)
  • Space bar / left click: jump
  • Enter:toggle zoom
  • Numpad 0: toggle filters
